title: Bloomberg Markets: Cognizant CFO on Digital Solutions Growth
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Cognizant CFO on Digital Solutions Growth
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Karen McLoughlin\u0010Chief Financial Officer\u0010Cognizant \u0010Discussing 3rd-quarter earnings and navigating the changes brought on by today’s digital revolution.
